data.blankContent: Hurricane Andres was the first named storm and hurricane of the 2009 Pacific hurricane season. Andres ____ weakened ____ the ____ of June 24 ____ a ____ storm. It ____ weakened ____ a ____ depression ____ the ____ of June 24. Then it began to dissipate.
data.partBlankContent: Hurricane Andres was the first named storm and hurricane of the 2009 Pacific hurricane season. Andres rap____ weakened o_ the mor____ of June 24 t_ a trop____ storm. It ag___ weakened t_ a trop____ depression o_ the afte_____ of June 24. Then it began to dissipate.
data.fullContent: Hurricane Andres was the first named storm and hurricane of the 2009 Pacific hurricane season. Andres rapidly weakened on the morning of June 24 to a tropical storm. It again weakened to a tropical depression on the afternoon of June 24. Then it began to dissipate.
data.answer: 飓风安德烈斯是2009年太平洋飓风季第一个被命名为风暴和飓风的飓风。安德烈斯在6月24日早晨迅速减弱为热带风暴。6月24日下午再次减弱为热带低气压。然后它开始消散。
